item.title: Daryl Hall & John Oates - Private Eyes

My friends wonder
why I call you
All of the time
what can I say

the need to
Give such
secrets away
You think maybe
I need help no
I know that
I’m right alright
I’m just
better off not
Listening to
friend’s advice

on knowing my bliss
I tell them this
when they want to

your kiss)

on my list
